meta_description: Consists of tuples of $l$ and $m$ values for all given values in the species_projected_dos_values_lm species field.
The quantum number $l$ represents the azimuthal quantum number, whereas for the quantum number $m$, besides the
conventional use as magnetic quantum number ($l+1$ integer values from $-l$ to $l$), a set of different
conventions is accepted. The adopted convention is specified by atom_projected_dos_m_kind.
